title: (x) Murano Urban Resort script - Ariston {Tiff}
content:
I need help identifying the script used in these screen shots from the [Murano Urban Resort](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141149/http:/www.muranoresort.com/murano.html) web site. I swear it's on the tip of my brain... Sort of like [Fluidum Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141149/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?nCo=AFMT&pid=205102), but not quite.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141149im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48402.jpg)

 [‹ Colorado Avalanche Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141149/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6555 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Type in British stamps - hand lettered by Eric Gill {Richard} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141149/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6553 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content: Ah, Miss Tiffany, you are a valuable gem indeed.
